message: Let's split it evenly. Fair deal?
I appreciate the offer Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the situation. This ensures you still get a good deal before inflation impacts the value further.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's go with 55/45.  Inflation is biting, but I'm still trying to be fair.
Alice, I understand the pressure of the inflation, so I'm adjusting my previous offer.  58/42 is my final offer, let's close this deal.
